Package controller

Class AdminController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.AdminController
  • public class AdminController
extends java.lang.Object
    The AdminController class is responsible for handling user interactions for the Admin scene(Admin.fxml). The Admin Scene occurs when the user decides to log in with the username "admin".
    Author:
    Vincent Phung, William McFarland

    • Field Summary

      Observable List that contains the list of all users in the application and updates automatically when changes occur.

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public void initialize()
        Method that is called when this scene is loaded. Initialize populates the users list and selects the first user in the list.

      • isDup

        private boolean isDup​(java.lang.String username)
        Method to check for duplicate usernames.
        Parameters:
        username - Username to check.
        Returns:
        False if the username is not already used, otherwise returns true.

      • addUser

        public void addUser​(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
             throws java.io.IOException
        Method that handles adding a new user. Creates a text input dialog and creates an error if the admin inputs an existing username.
        Parameters:
        e - The add button is clicked.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Exception thrown if creating a user fails.

      • deleteUser

        public void deleteUser​(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
                throws java.io.IOException
        Method that handles deleting a new user. Creates an alert dialog for the admin to confirm the delete action.
        Parameters:
        e - The delete button is clicked.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Exception thrown if creating a user fails.

      • logout

        public void logout​(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
            throws java.io.IOException
        Method that handles logging out
        Parameters:
        e - The delete button is clicked.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Exception thrown if creating a user fails.
